A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: On contrary to the critics opinion\, this is definitely not the best Star Wars movie since 1980. The movie does have some amazing scenes but lacks overall story plot with a lot of Star Wars Clichés to please the fans. The Force Awakens was better than this one for sure.  Hats off to the writers for expanding the galaxy with the introduction of new planets\, life forms\, expanding the force concept\, etc.  3/5 for the movie\,
